name: Brown Sugar Cookies
author: Noelle Hall
summary: These are really tasty. The flavor is even stronger if you let them sit after baking them overnight!
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Beat brown sugar, butter, eggs, and vanilla extract together in a bowl using an electric mixer until smooth and creamy
Whisk flour, baking powder, and salt together in a separate bowl
Stir flour mixture into butter mixture until dough is fully combined
Pour confectioners' sugar onto a large plate
Spoon dough, 1 1/2 teaspoons per cookie, onto confectioners' sugar and roll to coat
Arrange coated dough on a baking sheet
Bake in the preheated oven until edges are lightly browned, 12 to 14 minutes
Cool cookies on baking pan for 2 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely
